tool.name: JoinRefseqMouseGeneSymbol
tool.description: join table to mouse gene symbol data

param.name: input1
param.label: Select a suitable input file from your history

param.name: job_name
param.label: Supply a name for the outputs to remind you what they contain

configfiles.configfile:
cat("JoinRefseqMouseGeneSymbol Started......\n") cat("\n")
library("dplyr") library("plyr") library("stringr") library(Mus.musculus)
# transpose a tabular input file and write as a tabular output file ourargs = commandArgs(TRUE) inf = ourargs[1] outf = ourargs[2] cat("input file name:");inf cat("output file name:");outf cat("\n")
deg_output <- read.table(inf, header=T, row.names=1, sep="\t") head(deg_output);nrow(deg_output)
deg_type = ifelse((ncol(deg_output)==4),"edger","scde") print(deg_type)
deg_output\$REFSEQ <- rownames(deg_output) ref_key = ifelse(grepl("ENSMUST",deg_output\$REFSEQ[1]),22,17) print(ref_key)
mm = Mus.musculus mm_ant_ref<- select(mm, keys=keys(mm, keytype=keytypes(mm)[ref_key]), columns=columns(mm)[c(ref_key,18)], keytype=keytypes(mm)[ref_key]) names(mm_ant_ref)[1] <- paste("REFSEQ")
mm_ant_ref <- subset(mm_ant_ref, select=c("REFSEQ", "SYMBOL")) mm_ant_ref <- mm_ant_ref[!duplicated(mm_ant_ref\$REFSEQ),] head(mm_ant_ref);nrow(mm_ant_ref)
merge_symbol <- left_join(deg_output, mm_ant_ref, by="REFSEQ") head(merge_symbol);nrow(merge_symbol)
write.table(merge_symbol, outf, quote=FALSE, sep="\t",row.names=F)
cat("....All Done. End of Script\n")
